attributes.action: Force Members of Parliament to undergo a Yearly full Well Being Check Up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the changes in the internal structure of the Palace of Westminster to counter terrorists, and the high level use now of mechanical means to ventilate both House of Commons & House of Lords, a majority of the time the Members are at risk of poor air.
Thus causing their health to suffer, as well as making poor Government.
Hence in order to prove they are fit to Govern, like everyone else who has a responsible job, they undergo a yearly check up

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
